ctf.name: Capture the Flag
ctf.long: In Capture the Flag, you'll work quickly through a series of challenges to find “flags” — codes which can be entered to mark the challenge complete. There's a beginner track, and an experienced track, so participants of all level can participate.
ctf.scoring: Cities are ranked by how quickly they complete all of the challenges.

hungergames.name: The Hunger Games
hungergames.long: In this simulation of the popular series, you'll build bots to act as tributes, competing against other cities in a turn/tile-based arena. When CodeCup starts, the "Start" link will lead to the specifics you'll need to create your bots.
hungergames.scoring: At the end of the hour, all cities' bots will be run against each other, and the longest-surviving cities will receive points.
